cs213.photoAlbum.model

Class Album

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.model.Album
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Album
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Album class contains methods to add, delete, and recaption photos.
    Author:
    Jinhei
